Uses of Class
zipkin.storage.cassandra.CassandraStorage.Builder

    • Uses of CassandraStorage.Builder in zipkin.storage.cassandra

      Methods in zipkin.storage.cassandra that return CassandraStorage.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.builder() 
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.contactPoints(String contactPoints)
      Comma separated list of host addresses part of Cassandra cluster.
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.ensureSchema(boolean ensureSchema)
      Ensures that schema exists, if enabled tries to execute script io.zipkin:zipkin-cassandra-core/cassandra-schema-cql3.txt.
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.indexCacheMax(int indexCacheMax)
      Indicates the maximum trace index metadata entries to cache.
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.indexCacheTtl(int indexCacheTtl)
      Indicates how long in seconds to cache trace index metadata.
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.indexFetchMultiplier(int indexFetchMultiplier)
      How many more index rows to fetch than the user-supplied query limit.
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.indexTtl(int indexTtl)
      Deprecated. 
      current schema uses default ttls. This parameter will be removed in Zipkin 2
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.keyspace(String keyspace)
      Keyspace to store span and index data.
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.localDc(String localDc)
      Name of the datacenter that will be considered "local" for latency load balancing.
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.maxConnections(int maxConnections)
      Max pooled connections per datacenter-local host.
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.maxTraceCols(int maxTraceCols)
      Spans have multiple values for the same id.
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.password(String password)
      Will throw an exception on startup if authentication fails.
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.sessionFactory(SessionFactory sessionFactory)
      Override to control how sessions are created.
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.spanTtl(int spanTtl)
      Deprecated. 
      current schema uses default ttls. This parameter will be removed in Zipkin 2
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.strictTraceId(boolean strictTraceId)
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.username(String username)
      Will throw an exception on startup if authentication fails.
      CassandraStorage.Builder CassandraStorage.Builder.useSsl(boolean useSsl)
      Use ssl for connection.
